```{r}
library(modelr)
library(tidyverse)
library(GGally)
```

```{r}
alias(years_since ~ ., data = eruption_count)
```

```{r}
# Remove unnecessary columns
eruption_count_model <- eruption_count %>%
  select(-"volcano_number", 
         -"volcano_name", 
         -"last_eruption_year", 
         -"as.numeric(last_eruption_year)",
         -"primary_volcano_type",
         -"country",
         -"region",
         -"subregion",
         -"population_within_5_km",
         -"population_within_10_km",
         -"population_within_30_km",
         -"population_within_100_km",
         -"evidence_category")
```

```{r}
colnames(eruption_count)
```

```{r}
ggpairs(eruption_count_model)
```
